nodes.title: Added observer for not authorized publishes
Stopping all server threads and fixing ServerShutdownTest
Stopping the persistence commit scheduler in MapDBPersistentStore when it is closed
Fixing QOSType encoding and decoding of FAILURE qos (0x80).
Add test code for connection timeout. And fix Issue #101.
Fix multiple client connection using SSL issue #91
PubRelEncoder to encode following MQTT specification
Improving plugin manager's code and adding connect/disconnect plugin
Added authorizator and authenticator class load in config
Add class authenticator / authorizator options in config
add support for system properties in configuration
use moquette path property where possible
fix pom and clean deprecated class  and add bat file to windows
To fix #366，using ConnectionDescriptor instead of clientID as the key of will msg
feature: upgrade the test case of EmbeddedLauncher.
[Feature Request] Intercepting qos1/qos2/internal messages published to subscribers
Added try/catch blocks around calls to canRead and canWrite to protect subscription state.
Fix for CTrie TNode exception and other improvements to CTrie related
CTrie TNode fix, concurrency test fixes, client_id locking
The will-messages are not send to Interceptor implementation
MemorySessionStore configurable Cache for Session added
Allow custom server path for MQTT over websockets
#310 - Allow for topic/patterns with '#' and end of line comments
broker/MQTTMessageLogger: logging has blocked test builds
PersistentQueueMessageSender#sendPublish: warning should not be loged in OK case
Protocol processor added db type field
IMessagesStore#storeRetained: this method should decide to store QOS0 messages
Gc1 garbage collector added to start scripts
Prevent usage of MsgId 0 when wrapping around
LMDB persistent store implementation for Moquette
using reader idle to trigger the will message.
ScheduledExecutorService moved from MapDBPersistentStore to Server
The subscriptions tree must be pruned in order to prevent severe performance issues
Minor Checkstyle adjustement & Fromating broker folder
Include log traces and several bugfixes
adds storage and api for keeping track of most recent message time
implement #227, use of atomicintegers on reference counter
fixed ConcurrentModification Exceptions in MapDBSessionsStore, fixes #215
broker: notify when client connection lost
Changing some private classes/methods to public
Bugfix for ServerRestartIntegrationTest - Persistence file could not be deleted under Windows
Closing connection on non-zero return code in CONNACK packet.
Allow zero byte client identifiers in the connect message.
One param less in ClientSession subscribe method
Add clientID to the IAuthenticator interface
allow turn off of nonSSL MQTT,  and also accepts empty string to indicate turn off
fix CSV list bug, collect CSV list into constant, provide better logging on disabled SSL
allow set websocket_port = "" to disable websocket
Change the executing name of class in moquette.sh
Set maven POM version as constant (fix issue #112)
Fix #629: Adding subscriptions is very slow
Adds session events processors and queues of commands
Fix #629: Adding subscriptions is very slow
fix: re-factor Session creation logic and fix Session mem leaks
fix: add error-prone config for JDK8 (#53)
Remove BinTray definitions and GH Action
feat: expose netty enabled tls protocols option
Fixed #610: Subscriptions not removed from session on unsubscribe
Added missing release() for message removed from inflightWindow
Added a test to verify regressions for not ack-ed resends
Fix, avoid to increment inflight window counter in case of invalid ACK with invalid packet ID is received
Explicictly flush the downstream connection when a publish consumes all the inflight slots
Fix #455, #583, #587:  inlfightSlots counting, CCE & QoS2 deadlock
Remove explicit Comparator for already Comparable class
Transform Topic and Subscription to be Comparable
Introduce H2 ValueType to serialize PublishedMessage
Fix #583 inflight slots incremented too often
Fix #423 resent msg not added to timeout queue
Improves build by caching maven repo
Fixes the exception on DROP TABLE, by adding IF EXISTS
Fixes the relativePath pointing to the parent pom.
Fixed NPE due to TNode processing before CNode
Fix recreate sessions when server restarts
Fix bug in race condition between the shutdown of a client and the connect of another with same clientId
Introduced test to verify that connectionLost remove the new client session
Added configuration item for handshake timeout on SSL channel (#531)
Updated paho to 1.2.5 to fix CVE-2019-11777 (fixed in Pago 1.2.1)
Switched temp files in unit test to temp folder managed
Moved flow of CONNECT completely inside MQTTConnection
Added configuration item for handshake timeout on SSL channel (#531)
Updates Netty to 4.1.53 to have MQTT5 support
Added specific handling for BindExcpetion when the port is occupied
Re-generated keystores used in SSL tests
Reduce log level for log messages caused by client side input mistakes
Fixes #529, #505: NPE caused by matching on a TNode
fixed throw NullPointerException when new connection
Clean test storage on exit to prevent assert in next test
Fix retained messages with wildcard subscriptions
fix trie match bug and bytesMetrics bug
remove unnecessary quotes which fixes execution in windows 10
Make the number of Netty worker threads number configurable
Fix a bug Session#resendInflightNotAcked() fails due to handling a freed ByteBuf
Added possibility to configure additional Netty channel handlers
Refactors config implementation: Use java.util.Properties directly now
Enhanced exception handling / logging for invalid messages
DenyAllAuthorizatorPolicy should return false; dispatch connection&disconnection&connectionLost event to interceptor
Fixes NPE when client disconnects from the broker
Adds client remote address getter to ConnectionDescriptor class.
Fixed NPE while logging an unknown packet (Replaced with an IOException)
Fix issue #412,  Zero-length topic messages accepting
enable the usage of Netty OpenSSL provider implementation and PKCS12 key stores
